title: is this a bug and or a like some sort of accidental key cntrl error.
body: ever since last week  I don't now what happened to my client one day I just couldn't see my  in game chat box if so is there any whay that I can fix this if so somone pls help me..i don't want to be reported for not trying to communicate with the team and or miss out on vital information from my team...

replies.body:
Your chat box may have gone off screen, or a corruption with your config may have occurred.  A reset should fix it!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if it does the trick!
OMGOMGOMGOMG TY it worked ^^ i havnt seen the chat in months TY TYTY
